H

hasBluetooth(Context) - Static method in class com.aj.android.commons.app.DeviceUtils
Checks for hardware feature Bluetooth is available in device.
Will always return false, if the device API level 8 or Build.VERSION_CODES#FROYO.
hasCamera(Context) - Static method in class com.aj.android.commons.app.DeviceUtils
Checks camera availability based on API level.
hasFreeSpace(long) - Static method in class com.aj.android.commons.io.SDCardUtils
Check if free size is available for the given long bytes.
hasFrontCamera(Context) - Static method in class com.aj.android.commons.app.DeviceUtils
Checks for hardware feature front camera is available in device.
Will always return false, if the device API level 8 or Build.VERSION_CODES#FROYO.
hasGPS(Context) - Static method in class com.aj.android.commons.app.DeviceUtils
Checks for hardware feature GPS is available in device.
hasNFC(Context) - Static method in class com.aj.android.commons.app.DeviceUtils
Checks for hardware feature NFC is available in device.
Will always return false, if the device is API level 8 or Build.VERSION_CODES#FROYO.
hasPermission(Context, String) - Static method in class com.aj.android.commons.app.AppUtils
Used to check whether the application has given permission defined or not.
hasSdCard() - Static method in class com.aj.android.commons.io.SDCardUtils
Returns true if the device has SD Card.
hideInputKeyboard(Context, View) - Static method in class com.aj.android.commons.view.ViewUtils
Generic method to hide the input keyboard.
